step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Excellent execution of the circular motion. Focus on making the movement as fluid as possible, connecting the backward and downward phases.
You're completing the repetitions well. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for your lymphatic system and breathing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to take a deep breath in as you move your shoulders back.
